attributes.action: Make ALL water pollution into ANY body of natrual water a major crime.
attributes.additional_details:
Agricultural and farming waste, industrial waste,  sewage and water company waste,  Livestock waste,  septic tank waste, oil waste.   

No types of waste or byproducts at all should be allowed into waterways, rivers and seas. 

No ifs, no buts, no maybes. 

All enterprises has to be responsible for there own waste. Waterways are a dumping ground.  

We are on the verge of ecological breakdown and unless this stops with we see a human and environmental health crisis of epic proportions.
attributes.background: All forms of pollution into any natural body of water to be completely OUTLAWED.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you're concerned about water pollution, but we're not sure exactly what you want the Government or Parliament to do.

There are already offences for:

- discharging poisonous, noxious or polluting matter or solid waste matter into inland freshwater, coastal waters and relevant territorial waters.

- discharging trade or sewage effluent into inland freshwater, coastal waters and relevant territorial waters.

It's unclear what additional actions you want to be made an offence, or if and how you want penalties for existing offences to be changed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
